It will include fast switching of third-party applications and a significant upgrade to Internet Explorer 9, optimized for hardware acceleration on Windows Phone. We will bring multitasking to Windows Phone this year, Steve Ballmer said. And in the second half," we'll be able to give people the full Internet on their phone...[ the Internet] will be a first-class citizen on the phone."

The company states in a press release, When Michael Vick 's ribs were injured after being drilled by a pair of Washington Redskins, the Eagles equipment staff contacted Unequal to build a lightweight, comfortable, flexible vest that could withstand the force of a NFL style blitz. Unequal answered the call with its EXOskeleton â¢ technology that it originally developed for the military. Michael Vick used the Unequal Chest Protector in the November 7th game against the Indianapolis Colts to protect his ribs. After the game Michael Vick said the Unequal Pad made him feel invincible.
